About Carl.

Carl is a Front End Developer at Eyekiller, an award-winning agency. He is interested in accessibility, front end performance, and realising big ideas. Outside dev, he is dad and seasonal marathon runner. He doesn't always write in third-person. However, this felt like a good time to do so.
